/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/clisrv_retry.dir/clisrv_retry.cpp.o  -o clisrv_retry -Wl,-rpath,/home/chouer/workspace/vrep/coppeliasim/programming/bluezero/build:/usr/local/lib ../libb0.so /usr/local/lib/libzmq.so -lboost_thread -lboost_system -lboost_regex -lboost_timer -lboost_filesystem -lboost_serialization -lboost_program_options -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread -lz -llz4
